EditTextPreference.android:title: Alpha for low pass filter
EditTextPreference.android:summary: A lower alpha will try to 'smooth' the values more

SwitchPreference.android:title: Use the gyroscope to rotate the model
SwitchPreference.android:summary: If checked, it will use the gyroscope to rotate the model, otherwise it will use the rotation matrix from the accelerometer and compass

SwitchPreference.android:title: Use the acceleration to derive direction
SwitchPreference.android:summary: If true, it will use the acceleration, otherwise will derive velocity

SwitchPreference.android:title: User Control
SwitchPreference.android:summary: If checked, the user will be able to control the 3d model

SwitchPreference.android:title: Render shape for demo or show path
SwitchPreference.android:summary: If true, it will render a shape (cube or prism) otherwise it will show the path.

SwitchPreference.android:title: Use Cube
SwitchPreference.android:summary: If on, it will use the cube as the render, otherwise it will use the prism
